questions.quote: Thank you, but, unfortunately, I have much larger problems to fry. My wife, she has no respect for Milos anymore.
Yeah, but, Jackie Chiles, he put a restraining order on me.  I'm not allowed within two hundred feet of his office. I couldn't even give him his Christmas present.
Of course. C'mon Georgie, you wanna tell me. It's eating you up inside. Sing it, sister.
Yes, it was purple, I liked it, I don't actually recall considering the buttons.
You know as far as I'm concerned, this whole thing is George's fault
The Dominicans are rolling them too tight.  Uhm, well, that's why you gotta get real Cubans.
I gust met Uma Therman. She's giving me her telephone number. Uma Jerry, Uma.
Make-up sex? You have to have that right after the fight, we're way past that.
Jerry have you ever seen any of those impressionist paintings?
Yeah, you're better off sitting around here, reading comic books, and eating spaghetti at two in the morning..
